main event: A report of an unidentified flying object sighted in Norfolk, Virginia on July 1, 1958.
interesting points: The object was first observed by a neighbor while gardening and was described as looking like a bright star,The object was seen by multiple neighbors and family members using a homemade telescope and binoculars,The sighting lasted for about 45 minutes, with the object showing a distinct round shape and metallic glint,Weather officials confirmed no weather balloons were in the area,The report was part of the AF continuous analysis of UFO phenomena.
sighted object: a bright round object with a metallic glint
witness description: neighbors and family members, including the writer's father, mother, and sister
